title: Undefeated
description: After a bold and dangerous mission to protect the ones they love, it’s time for the Justice alpha warriors to turn the page in Suzanne Halliday’s enthralling Family Justice novel  Deception – Zero Team Justice – Undefeated  The last thing Family Justice needed was more drama. The ladies held a meeting and took a vote. It was unanimous. Enough with the damn Justice disturbances. They all needed a break. A good long break.  As life in Bendover resets to normal, it’s the usual hijinks, surprises and memorable good times. Undefeated has it all. A wedding double-header, a memorable appearance by Desert Thunder, kids, horses, and dogs.  But just below the surface there are growing concerns.  Domineau Rivera thought she was invincible until a vicious assault leaves her bloodied and emotionally wounded.  The high of giving birth on Christmas Day quickly evaporates for Angelina Sullivan when the trauma from her kidnapping comes back with a vengeance.  And then there’s Meghan Marquez. Despite her charmed life, handsome, powerful husband and two beautiful children she was speeding toward a crisis.  There’s also a beautiful surprise, and a shocking discovery, alongside a makeover with eye opening results.  This time it’s the Ladies of Justice who come packing a wallop.
author: Suzanne Halliday
